A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
While parts of the movie were tacky\, all in all the film was phenomenal to watch. It was stunning visually\, and was very funny in certain parts. I felt that characters established in The Force Awakens were developed nicely and that characters introduced in this movie weren't wasted. It was a really good movie\, but it was not perfect. 
What could make it better?:
Recent Star Wars movies have made a habit of slow pacing until the third act. I believe that if the movie had the same pacing and character development as the third act\, it would be a much better\, and near perfect movie. 
I give it an 8.5/10
